unnormalised: Delhi's air quality continues to be a concern, folks! The latest readings show AQI levels fluctuating between 'poor' and 'very poor'. Remember those Diwali firecrackers? Still lingering, it seems.
normalised: Delhi's air quality continues to be a concern, folks! The latest readings show A Q I levels fluctuating between 'poor' and 'very poor'. Remember those Diwali firecrackers? Still lingering, it seems.

unnormalised: Dr. Sharma from IIT Kanpur says crop burning in Haryana and Punjab is also a major culprit this year. The smog is so thick you can barely see India Gate from Connaught Place some days!
normalised: Doctor Sharma from I I T Kanpur says crop burning in Haryana and Punjab is also a major culprit this year. The smog is so thick you can barely see India Gate from Connaught Place some days!

unnormalised: The government is pushing for more electric vehicles and stricter emission norms, but it's slow going. Rs. 5000 fine for burning waste in public? Seems like that's not much of a deterrent.
normalised: The government is pushing for more electric vehicles and stricter emission norms, but it's slow going. Rupees five thousand fine for burning waste in public? Seems like that's not much of a deterrent.

unnormalised: Experts recommend staying indoors as much as possible and using air purifiers. Schools are even considering closing outdoor activities.
normalised: Experts recommend staying indoors as much as possible and using air purifiers. Schools are even considering closing outdoor activities.

unnormalised: Meanwhile, Mumbai seems relatively better, but still, stay safe! Check your local AQI updates and maybe plant a few more tulsi plants - every little bit helps! Imagine if everyone had even a small green space of 100 sq ft. Air quality's an issue we gotta tackle together!
normalised: Meanwhile, Mumbai seems relatively better, but still, stay safe! Check your local A Q I updates and maybe plant a few more tulsi plants - every little bit helps! Imagine if everyone had even a small green space of one hundred square feet. Air quality's an issue we got to tackle together!
